scs_01.Description: During the past week: During the day, when do you feel there is more saliva in your mouth?

Levels.2: Throughout the day, not related to meals
Levels.3: All the time, even when I am asleep

scs_02.Description: During the past week: When you are asleep, how much saliva is there in your mouth?

Levels.0: I don?t notice an increase in saliva
Levels.1: I notice increased amounts of saliva in my mouth, but my pillow doesn?t get wet
Levels.3: My pillow and other bedclothes get wet

scs_03.Description: During the past week: While you are awake:

Levels.2: Saliva accumulates on my lips, but I don?t drool

scs_04.Description: During the past week: Does accumulation of saliva in your mouth impair your speech?

Levels.1: I must swallow frequently to avoid difficulties

scs_05.Description: During the past week: Does accumulation of saliva in your mouth impair your eating ability?

Levels.1: I must swallow frequently to avoid difficulties

scs_06.Description: During the past week: How many times do you drool during the daytime?

Levels.2: Often. I have to carry a handkerchief with me all the time

scs_07.Description: During the past week: When you go out or on social occasions, does saliva accumulation bother you?

Levels.1: I notice an accumulation, but it does not bother me
Levels.2: I realize other people notice it, but I can control the situation (for example, with a handkerchief)
Levels.3: I have stopped attending social meetings
